io.doov.core.dsl.impl.base

Class BooleanFunction

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.doov.core.dsl.impl.DefaultFunction<java.lang.Boolean,PredicateMetadata>
      • io.doov.core.dsl.impl.base.BooleanFunction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContextAccessor<java.lang.Boolean>, Function<java.lang.Boolean>, DSLBuilder, MappingInput<java.lang.Boolean>, Readable

    public class BooleanFunction
extends DefaultFunction<java.lang.Boolean,PredicateMetadata>
    Base class for boolean conditions.

    It contains a DslField to get the value from the model, a BooleanFunctionMetadata to describe this node, and a BiFunction to take the value from the model and return an optional value.
